data.lyric:
[ti:I Love You So]
[ar:The Walters]
[al:Songs for Dads]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Love You So - The Walters
[00:13.65]I just need someone in my life to give it structure
[00:19.55]To handle all the selfish ways I'd spend my time without her
[00:26.07]Everything I want but I can't deal with all your lovers
[00:32.39]Saying I'm the one but it's your actions that speak louder
[00:38.69]Giving me love when you are down and need another
[00:44.83]I've got to get away and let you go I've got to get over
[00:51.21]But I love you so
[00:57.81]I love you so
[01:04.03]I love you so
[01:10.45]I love you so
[01:14.61]I'm gonna pack my things and leave you behind
[01:21.02]This feeling's old and I know that I've made up my mind
[01:27.32]I hope you feel what I felt when you shattered my soul
[01:33.56]'Cause you were cruel and I'm a fool
[01:37.19]So please let me go
[01:41.88]But I love you so
[01:45.45]Please let me go
[01:48.43]I love you so
[01:51.40]Please let me go
[01:54.55]I love you so
[01:58.06]Please let me go
[02:00.91]I love you so
data.trans:
[ti:I Love You So]
[ar:The Walters]
[al:Songs for Dads]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:13.65]我只需要一个人陪在我的生命里给我一点慰藉
[00:19.55]没有她我会独自度过我所有自私的时光
[00:26.07]我想要的一切可我无法面对你的情人
[00:32.39]口口声声说我是你的真命天子可你的行动才是最有力的证明
[00:38.69]在你失落需要别人的时候给我爱
[00:44.83]我必须逃离让你离开我必须放下过去
[00:51.21]可我深爱着你
[00:57.81]我好爱你
[01:04.03]我好爱你
[01:10.45]我好爱你
[01:14.61]我要收拾行李把你甩在身后
[01:21.02]这种感觉历久弥新我知道我已经下定决心
[01:27.32]我希望你能体会我在你摧毁我灵魂时的感受
[01:33.56]因为你残忍无情我愚蠢至极
[01:37.19]所以拜托你让我走吧
[01:41.88]可我深爱着你
[01:45.45]请让我走
[01:48.43]我好爱你
[01:51.40]请让我走
[01:54.55]我好爱你
[01:58.06]请让我走
[02:00.91]我好爱你
